author: ae
description: Custom planets with cliff biomes. Client-side part of the mod, for use with the system editor. Replaces 'sandbox' planet and biome types.

author: eluvatar
description: Display strategic  build icons over normal build icons

author: SXX, Yrrep, DeathByDenim
description: Fixes the mouse cursor when using Mesa or bumblebee under Linux.

author: DeathByDenim
description: Automatically selects your favourite colour in the lobby.
description_de: Wählt automatisch Ihre Lieblingsfarbe in der Lobby aus.
description_fr: Choisit automatiquement votre couleur préférée dans le foyer.
description_nl: Kiest automatisch uw favoriete kleur in de lobby.

author: DeathByDenim
description: Keep notes on players for future reference
description_de: Führen Sie Notizen über die andere Spieler für zukünftige Verwendung.
description_fr: Enregistrer des notes à propos des autres joueurs pour utiliser en futur.
description_nl: Houd notities over spelers bij voor toekomstig gebruik.

author: DeathByDenim
description: Shows which players are in a game from the server browser without actually joining the lobby.
description_de: Zeigt Ihnen welche Spieler teilnehmen an einem Spiel aus dem Serverbrowser ohne im Lobby selbst zu gehen.
description_fr: Montrer quels joueurs participer à un jeu dans le navigateur serveur sans entrer le foyer.
description_nl: Laat zien welke spelers deelnemen aan een spel vanuit de server browser zonder de lobby zelf in te gaan.

author: DeathByDenim
description: Shows off-line status of fellow players.
description_de: Zeigen Sie den off-line Status der Mitspieler.
description_nl: Toont de off-line status van de medespelers.

author: LavaSnake
description: PA has a bug that prevents it from displaying the Ant's proper name; this mod fixes that.

author: LavaSnake
description: Lets you set your own custom names for each unit and building in the settings menu.

author: LavaSnake
description: Three customizable in-game timers for reminders and other events. (See forum link for screenshots and instructions.)

author: LavaSnake
description: A powerful mod that lets you set a profile picture, a tracking/sig picture, and custom HTML snippets for PA's main menu.

author: LavaSnake
description: PA has a bug that prevents it from displaying the Stargate's proper name; this mod fixes that.

author: LavaSnake
description: Ever wanted to command legions of Jaffa warriors, swarms of Abrams tanks, or fleets of X-302s? Well now you can with the Stargate Unit Names mod!

author: MushrooMars
description: Factory fab shader that makes you taste the rainbow!

author: burntcustard, proeleert, cptconundrum
description: Click once to set camera anchor, and again to snap back there.
description_nl: Sla Cameraposities op met een knop en klik nog eens om terug te keren.

author: burntcustard
description: Stops a PIP appearing when putting mouse over an alert, to help reduce lag.

author: burntcustard, DeathByDenim
description: Shows secondary colours in lobby, and allows you to select which you use.

author: burntcustard
description: Removes empty build bar boxes and does stuff

author: Cola_Colin
description: Change Batchsize from 5 to 100

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Some hotkeys for switching to special camera modes.

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Makes the PiP window draggable.

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Improves the system selection screen so that you can see every planet in a system.

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Plays the GG Button sound every time someone types GG in chat.

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Lets you change the game lobby name that shows in the server browser.

author: Captain Conundrum, Cola_Colin, someonewhoisnobody
description: Gives spectators a button to show live PA Stats charts in the game. You can also open the chart with ctrl+space

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Replaces Uber's random names with planet names from Star Wars, Stargate, Star Trek or Legacy (Names from TA and SupCom). Pick the theme from the settings menu.

author: Captain Conundrum, maxpowerz
description: Adds a button in the system panel to focus the pip on that planet.

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Share your favorite systems with other users. eXodus eSports, PACE, and The Realm maps are available as well.

author: Captain Conundrum, LavaSnake, Martenus
description: Adds a sketch.js layer over the game window so that casters can draw lines or arrows on the screen.

author: Captain Conundrum
description: Opens a new picture-in-picture that tracks the selected unit if you press CTRL+T. INCOMPATIBLE with the Draggable Pip mod for now.

author: danzel
description: Adds a Metal Spot count to the System View and makes it show all the time.

author: danzel
description: Provides a timer to show how long the current match has been running

author: danzel
description: Shows a overlay for TeamSpeak chat. Requires TeamSpeak3 WebSockets plugin (see forum thread)

author: Dementiurge
description: Shows planet details in the New Game and Lobby screens.

author: Dementiurge
description: A more subdued orbital booster.

author: GTC-Gonzo
description: GW: Move over any explored systems

author: Mauru
description: More options/filters for unit selection

author: Mauru
description: A Framework for handling process events sent to the engine

author: ZaphodX, iceDrop
description: Changes all the circle builds to line build (metal+energy storage)

author: yuuzhantar
description: Changes the line builds to circle build (energy plant + advanced energy plant)

author: Moldez

description: Supreme Commander icons in PA!

description_nl: Kies een toetsenbordknop om meerdere gebouwen te bouwen en meer... (bekijk forum voor screenshots en instructies.)

author: Raevn
description: Allows selection of which unit types display alerts when built, under attack or destroyed

author: Raevn
description: Set Chrono time by clicking any point on the chrono bar

author: Raevn
description: Framework for adding new settings

author: raevn
description: Changes the colour of player names in the in-game chat to match their team colour

author: Raevn
description: Adds a large preview image of the selected Commander in the Armoury

author: Raevn
description: A Framework for obtaining unit, tool and ammo data

author: LavaSnake, raevn, and others
description: Adds a HUD that tracks your commander's health and more!

author: raevn
description: Framework for creating draggable UI containers

author: Raevn
description: Adds a 'Mods' tab on the main menu which shows a list of currently enabled mods, and if any require updates

author: Raevn
description: View details on all PA units

author: rcix
description: Changes the Build Color to your Team Color instead of green

author: Shalkka
description: Organise information in teams

author: someonewhoisnobody
description: Corrects the beginning of the version number to Cheese

author: someonewhoisnobody
description: Adds an in game web browser

author: sootn
description: An overview of all your units and structures in a list.

author: Stuart98
description: Applies the now unused Able commander textures to the Progenitor.

author: Stuart98
description: Replaces the energy plant model with one from the Alpha.

author: Stuart98
description: Replaces the icon for the Tropical planet in the system editor with a more fitting icon.

author: Stuart98
description: Replaces the earth planet background with the promotional metal planet art.

author: superouman
description: Use and import different skyboxes. Visit www.superouman.net/planetary-annihilation-skyboxes.html to get a large catalog of skyboxes

author: superouman
description: Removes the grey lighting from the fog of war. For cinematic purposes.

author: superouman
description: Puts more space between dragged turret lines

author: tatsu
description: Forged Alliance Forever-inspired icons

author: tatsu
description: Forged Alliance Forever-inspired icons

author: trialq
description: Adds eco-management buttons to ui

author: trialq
description: Writes dynamic alliances in chat whenever they change, so spectators know who's allied (players need to have the mod)

author: trialq
description: Audibly alert the player, repeatedly, when the economy is being wasted or stalling.

author: trialq
description: Automatically build units with idle factories, when eco would otherwise be wasted

author: trialq
description: Use buildings to write text. See forum for details

author: trialq
description: Adds a custom tab to the build bar

author: trialq
description: Provides short bites of information. Did you know this mod is awesome?

author: trialq
description: Replaces commander graphics with dox (build a dox army and play hide-and-seek). Gentlemen's rules, everyone must enable it and use the tank commander.

author: trialq
description: A new deck for use in Galactic War

author: trialq
description: New loadouts for use in Galactic War

author: trialq
description: Fixes the stock cards that buff a units speed, so the buff is actually applied.

author: trialq
description: Hides the UberBar everywhere.

author: trialq
description: Exposes the match making partially implemented by Uber (not for mainstream use, WIP functionality is exposed for those who want to test it)

author: trialq
description: Adds input validation in system editor, so editor crashes less

author: vipez
description: Christmas Spirit in PA!

author: The Magnificent Werty
description: Shows a live graph depicting your Energy and Metal income history.

author: The Magnificent Werty
description: Can ping your enabled mods into ingame chat.

author: The Magnificent Werty
description: [mod debug tool] Enables easy breakpoints and clean overview of all mod sources in the Coherent UI Debugger. Warning: Shadows common.js to include scripts into head by src and not by appending text.

author: Xedi
description: Strategic icons in the style of Supreme Commander

author: Stuart98, bgolus
description: Makes nights much, much darker..

author: SquishyPon3, TheTrophySystem, Zombiefan564, Stuart98, ZX0
description: A version of Statera compiled for the Galactic War. Can and likely will break who the heck knows what.

description: Enanbles icons in Statera.

description: Changes the Lathe Spray to your Team Color instead of green

description: Changes the Uber Canon Effects to your Team Color instead of blue

author: warren
description: Locates commander.

author: wondible
description: By installing and using this mod you indicate your acceptance of the pre-release disclaimer.  So you don't have to do it EVERY... SINGLE... TIME... you start the game.

author: wondible
description: Adds hotkey for pasting 10 or N units with the create-unit cheat.

author: wondible
description: Enable use of the WIP custom formations by right-button drag with move command.

author: wondible
description: Highlight commanders and fabulous fabbers in the selected unit icons.

author: wondible
description: Status bar that emphasises income and expense so that they can be visually compared.

author: wondible
description: Allow you to hold shift while using build and other hotkeys.

author: wondible
description: Provide larger hitboxes for switching players, keybinds, and better indication of the selected player.

author: wondible
description: One click to start a game vs an AI with no economy, or as configured in settings.

author: wondible
description: Provides a Reconnect button on the start menu when you are still assigned to a game.  A reconnect option is also provided in the live game ESC menu which will attempt to restore a disconnected session.

author: wondible
description: Enable the grid sandbox biome in the system editor, just in case moon isn't flat enough.

author: wondible
description: Puts the sandbox unit toolbox in order, and removes most not-normally-buildable units.  Incorporates the 'Sandbox Unit Toolbox' mod.

author: wondible
description: Enable the unit creation toolbox when the create-unit cheat is enabled.

author: SXX, wondible
description: This is just shader without using noise and unused code but it's still looks valid. Made for R600g Linux users (PA#2321), but will also work to decrease GPU load because default shader is super heavy.

author: wondible
description: Use secondary color for icon outlines, and white for selected.

author: wondible
description: Only warn about new game versions once, because it ALWAYS comes up in PTE.

author: wondible
description: Change Orange to Yellow so you can tell it from Red.

author: Pt4h
description: Fixes a bug where the Ptahosaurus is not correctly displayed in the main menu.

author: mereth
description: Filter both non-modded and modded games by default. Also add colors to the modded column.

author: mereth
description: Add a 'Show Replays' entry in the UberBar contextual menu.

author: mereth
description: You don't like the default filters in the server browser ? This mod will automatically save your selection.

author: mereth
description: Change color of starting planets name in server browser to green.

author: mereth
description: Change the 12AM/PM clock for a 24H clock.

author: Stan_petit_cul
description: Improves the Eco Information bars

author: Cola_Colin
description: Filter what alerts you want to see. Also provides a Framework for a unified, easy to use alerts API that does not create conflicts between mods.

author: Cola_Colin
description: Speed up the UI a _lot_. May introduce UI bugs. Test for yourself, report in the forums :)

author: Cola_Colin
description: Mod tries to make it easier to configure multiscreen pip setups. Best used together with some sort of fullscreen script

author: Cola_Colin, Gunshin
description: Track your statistics

author: Cola_Colin
description: Allows to scale the UI for smaller display resolutions

author: pownie
description: Hate that Main Menu upon failing to join a game? Fret not, now you get back to the list of games.

author: pownie
description: Allows to login to twitch and control the stream from the main menu

author: ORFJackal
description: Shows the fabrication rate and energy consumption of the selected units and factories

author: ORFJackal
description: Shows how your in-game stats compare to other players, to help in learning how fast to expand

author: ORFJackal
description: Improved spectator visibility controls. Use Shift-Click to select multiple players.

author: sirscruff - packaging:Corang
description: Green: Economic - Blue: Factories - Red: Strategic - Yellow: Defensive -- T2 Buildings have a more intense glow

author: SideSplitter
description: Automatically chooses the commander selected in the armory

description: Adds Age Of Empires II Taunts to Planetary Annihilation

author: ae
description: Custom planets with cliff biomes. Server side part of the mod. Replaces 'sandbox' planet and biome types.

author: burntcustard
description: All structures and units assist in the destruction of your enemies through extreme Boom Bot usage.

author: trialq
description: Turns the Commander into a static factory

description: Frontloads damage dealt by dox (weapons deal 100 damage every 10 seconds instead of 10 damage every second)

author: trialq
description: Players start with so much eco, they don't need to worry about eco management

author: trialq
description: Players start with 50,000 metal, but cannot build metal extractors

author: trialq
description: Makes every unit 5x quicker.

description: Kill your targets
